group.title: Artifact group name
group.description: Group name for all artifacts produced by this Multiproduct, typically 'com.linkedin.@spec.name@'.

version.title: Multiproduct version
version.description: Version used for all artifacts produced by this Multiproduct, typically '<major>.<minor>.*'.

scmUrl.title: Source code repository URL
scmUrl.description: Repository URL from which to check out the source code.

codecoveragecheckinprecommit.title: Code coverage settings
codecoveragecheckinprecommit.description: Code coverage threshold settings for committing. See http://go/codecoveragecheckinprecommit for details.

runtime.title: Deprecated
runtime.description: This field is no longer used.

service_guard_owners.title: Service control owners
service_guard_owners.description: LDAP usernames of people who may control the service built by this Multiproduct (e.g. stop, start).

workspace_siblings.title: Deprecated
workspace_siblings.description: This field is no longer used.

type.title: Deprecated
type.description: This field is no longer used.

comment.title: Deprecated
comment.description: this field is no longer used.

watchers.title: Deprecated
watchers.description: This field is no longer used.

review.title: Code review settings
review.description: Kibitzer settings. See http://go/kibitzer for details.

topology.title: Deployment information
topology.description: Information for deploying the services built by this Multiproduct. See http://go/topologyspec for details.

archive.title: Artifact repository information
archive.description: Information for archiving the artifacts produced by this Multiproduct.

dependencyResolution.title: Deprecated
dependencyResolution.description: This field is no longer used.

external.title: Third party dependencies
external.description: Dependencies on non-Linkedin artifacts. Specified as object entries with the key <local name> and value <group name>:<artifact name>:<version>. The <local name> is used to refer to the artifact in build files.

product.title: Multiproduct dependencies
product.description: Dependencies on artifacts produced by Multiproducts.

trunkDev.title: CI settings
trunkDev.description: CI pipeline settings such as auto revert, pool selection, and resource requirements. See http://go/mptrunkdev for details.

extSCM.title: External SCM references
extSCM.description: Additional SCM repositories that comprise the Multiproduct's source code (e.g. configs).

variants.title: Build variants
variants.description: Platforms on which the product should be built. See https://iwww.corp.linkedin.com/wiki/cf/x/43eIC for details.
